channel.title: Portfolio on CtrlAltDelete.nu
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on CtrlAltDelete.nu

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: These are some of the projects I have been involved in, one way or another. Most of the projects are related to school, but some have I worked on during my free time. School projects Aerial Aerial is a project where you control an airplane by moving a smartphone around. The goal of the project was to make something which somebody paralyzed from the neck and downwards could interact with.
